Main Prey: Krill, herring, sand eels, sprat, capelin, silverfish, and lanternfish
Fun Fact: Minke Whales are the smallest member in the family of Baleen Whales.
Estimated Population Size: Common Minke Whale: 180,000; Antarctic Minke Whale: 515,000
Other Name(s): Lesser Rorqual, Lesser Finback, Sharp-Headed Finner, Little Finner, Pike Whale
Habitat: Temperate, tropic, or sub tropic waters
Name: Minke Whale
